content.rendered:
Directed by Mairzee Almas. Russell Lee Fine. Everardo Gout. Robert Townsend.

Written by Eric Garcia. Eric Garcia. Kate Barnow. Kalen Egan. Evan Endicott. Garrett Lerner. Josh Stoddard. Ning Zhou.

Cast Giancarlo Esposito, Rufus Sewell, Paz Vega, Rosaline Elbay

Language English.

Producers Fred Berger. Brad Carpenter. Christie Colliopoulos. Russell Lee Fine. Justin Levy. Eric Garcia. Kate Barnow. Kalen Egan. Evan Endicott. Brian Kavanaugh-Jones. Clayton Krueger. Garrett Lerner. Ridley Scott. Jordan Sheehan. Josh Stoddard. Neri Kyle Tannenbaum. David W. Zucker.

Production Automatik Entertainment. Netflix Studios. Scott Free Productions.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 9

Status Finished (2023–2023)
